website_summaries.verdict: Although not as powerful as some other models, this inexpensive stun gun uses 3 deterrents – voltage, light, and sound – to put would-be attackers on alert.
pros: In addition to delivering a jolt, it also has a bright LED light and siren
Price falls on the lower end of the spectrum
cons: Some stun guns quit charging for no apparent reason
Packs a punch, but may not take down an attacker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my ex-husband LOVE IT. DON'T MESS WITH ME
customer_reviews.author: Sam Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great protection!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter in law because she does Uber and Lyft at night and needs protection. It's got some weight to it which is good. I got this one because the prongs are big and stand out more also the siren and flash light are a must. With this, she feels safer.
customer_reviews.author: selena nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, no punch, good for massages
customer_reviews.text: I've worked in law enforcement, my first and overall impression is that this is cheap. Feels cheap, somehow in a panic situation your suppose to remember to flip a switch on the bottom before you press a second switch on the side. Lastly, my 1 year old daughter packs a harder punch. I started using this to massage my muscles because it doesn't pack enough amperage to do any real good. Oooohhh those arcs are scary, but that's all it's good for, you could say "shock" but no awe.
customer_reviews.author: Odin the All Father

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband after I purchased mine. Can't say enough great things about this stun gun. Nice fit in his hands, handle releases if pulled and stays charged. My husband was very happy with the Stun Gun. Instructions are easy to follow. Would purchase from again.
customer_reviews.author: Heidarella

customer_reviews.title: Stun Device Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is my third unit from different makers over the years,. They have improved greatly. At this price point I am very please and have bought subsequent four for each female in my life I worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I received this item today. It looks really good. The siren is loud and the flashlight works. In the short test I did it will be a great self defense item! The sound is very intimidating. Hopefully I never have to use it but I feel safer knowing I can protect myself and my boys if I need to!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: I think it works, I hope it works
customer_reviews.text: It got here as promised. I tried it by following the instructions and pressing the red button and saw the electric current and the light and the siren seem to work fine. The only thing I couldn't really test is the reaction by a person when they are touched by the stun gun. I asked my wife to take one for the team to make sure it worked but she only would try it if she could test her "Dirty Harry" 44 Magnum on me (just kidding). Seriously, I hope it is effective.
customer_reviews.author: Mel B.

customer_reviews.title: Protect your love ones the safe way.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my Son. Great protection and safe. Awesome. It is worth the money. Very inexpensive, strong and lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol hernandez

customer_reviews.title: This would have been a great product!!! Please read on..
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a great product, it has lots of futures and value. However, the power plug makes it a terrible product. It is a hazard waiting to happen. The plug doesn't meet current fire code...the charging cable is short and the plug doesn't stay in the outlet...it come out frequently and caused occasional sparks. I will not recommend this product!! Minus the power plug, it would have been a 5 star item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Awesome... my girls loved it! Know my mom wants one 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Sharla perez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work and very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for protection as I work long hours and into the night. I kept it charged and would try it from time to time, but then one day it just stopped working and it was conveniently after the return date of June 8th. I have tried to reach out to Policemart.com thinking I could use the product warranty and the phone number on the website is not a good number. I also tried to reach out via email through the website to no avail as well. I just spent $30 on a terrible product that is absolutely useless. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa LaCombe

customer_reviews.title: 3 protection features in one unit. I love it!

customer_reviews.title: You have to recharge it every day it doesn't stay charged

product_meta.title: POLICE Stun Gun TW10-58 Billion Heavy Duty Rechargeable with Siren Alarm LED Flashlight
product_meta.description: POLICE TW10 stun gun for self defense is engineered to meet the demands of police, military, and security professionals worldwide but also available to civilians. POLICE stun gun TW10 is made with ultra strong ABS plastic with non-slip rubber coating, and delivers strongest available power! It features LED flashlight, loud police siren alarm and built-in rechargeable battery. Our POLICE TW10 stun gun flashlight is convenient size: 6” long x 2” wide and 1” thick so it conceals easily and easily slips into a pocket or purse. POLICE TW10 stun gun also comes with on/off safety switch (to prevent accidental discharge) and free holster case for easy everyday carrying. POLICE is a registered US trademark. POLICE - BE SAFE!
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL SELF DEFENSE EQUIPMENT: Powerful heavy duty stun gun flashlight combination. Delivers strongest available power and comes with the Lifetime Warranty.
LED TACTICAL FLASHLIGHT: Is also great for personal protection! May help disorient the attacker from a distance, possibly allowing you to escape to safety before needing to use the stun feature.

BUILT IN 120dB LOUD SIREN ALARM: Great addition to stun gun for self defense. Alarm can be activated and scare off a potential attacker. NON SLIP RUBBER COATING: Mold this unit to your hand for a firm and comfortable grip.
INTERNAL RECHARGEABLE BATTERY: Our stun gun simply plugs into a standard wall outlet for a complete recharge. No Batteries needed! Charging cord included.
CONVENIENT SIZE: 6” long x 2” wide x 1". This stun gun also comes with on/off safety switch and holster case for easy everyday carrying.
